answers.answer: I understand I am in the same boat with tears and I am only 5feet
I've decided that from today I cut the junk food... I'm realistic though and am not ticking to portion control.
Have you been checked for gestational diabetes? That could be the cause of the excessive weight gain. Has your doctor brought up your weight at all?

question: I'm 21wks with my third.About a year ago, I lost nearly 10kgs. Yesterday I weighed myself and I've gained 12kg already! I'm now the heaviest I've ever been and am heavier than I ever was with both my other children (I only put on 10kg total with them!) and I've still got so long to go....I know what I need to do to control it but I just needed to vent it and put it out there!
title: Excessive weight gain!
